casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America ex rel. CHIN MOON JIT, Father and Next Friend of Chin Lum On, Relator-Appellant, v. Rudolph REIMER, Commissioner of Immigration, Chinese Inspector in Charge of the Port of New York, or Any One Else Having the Custody of the Above-Named Relator, Respondent-Appellee. No. 88. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 21, 1935. John J. Glynn, of New York City (William J. Reinhart, Jr., of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. F. W. H. Adams, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Irvin C. Rutter, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
